about_the_game:
Outlaw class for Shades Of Rayna.

Outlaw is a class in the game and uses double pistols and just like other classes, has 10 active and 5 passive skills.

Actives:
Barrelad - Shoot an explosive arrow towards mouse location
Rapid Gun - Shoot a couple of bullets in succession towards mouse location
Dynamite - Throw a dynamite towards mouse location
Thunderfall - Shoot an orb in the air that shoots 4 lightning bullets around
Hall of Fire - Shoot an orb in the air that shoots 3 lines of fire bullets toward mouse location
Noxious Blast - Throw a poisonous orb, then shoot it with a bullet to create a poisonous explosion
Bullet Rain - Shoot bunch of bullets in the air to create a rain of bullets on mouse location
Wheel of Frost - Throw a rotating wheel that has pistols attached to itself
Tornado - Shoot a bunch of bullets while rotating around yourself
Spiral - Launch yourself towards mouse location while shooting multiple bullets

Passives:
Minade - With 35% chance, you leave bombs on your location when you dodge. Side dodges leave multiple bombs
Steal - Your basic attacks steal 0.2% of your max health amount of life to your health
Second Chance - When your health reach 0, you resurrect with %50 health (Triggers once in a map)
Expullet - With 35% chance, your basic attack bullets explode and deal area damage
Deadeye - Every damaged enemy fills up Deadeye bar. When maxed, all enemies in basic attack range gets shot

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
